H0.text: In the TV series Doctor Who, who was the creator of the Daleks and arch enemy of the Doctor. The Master

H1.text: In the TV series Doctor Who, who was the creator of the Daleks and arch enemy of the Doctor. Cyber Controller

H2.text: In the TV series Doctor Who, who was the creator of the Daleks and arch enemy of the Doctor. Rassilon

H3.text: In the TV series Doctor Who, who was the creator of the Daleks and arch enemy of the Doctor. Davros

A4.text: The Daleks were created by Terry Nation.

A5.text: The Daleks, their creator Davros, the Cybermen, and the renegade Time Lord the Master.

A6.text: The Daleks were created by the writer Terry Nation and BBC designer Raymond Cusick.
